Use a dumbbell as a candle holder with a lighter attached to the end.
Use a dumbbell as a plant support by attaching it to the stem of the plant.
Use a dumbbell as a bookend by stacking books on top of it.
Use a dumbbell as a makeshift sculpture by painting it and displaying it as a decorative piece.
Use a dumbbell as a door stopper by attaching a rubber band to the bottom of the dumbbell.
